title: So, yesterday I asked out the girl that I like..
body:
And she said yes! I've had a thing for her for a while now but only just recently tried actually asking her out. It's actually the first time I ever asked a girl out, and I'm relieved that it actually worked out.

We're not in a relationship yet, but it's the first step!

Yay me!! :D

Edit: So.. I didn't expect this to make the front page or break out into an argument about religion, but uhh... yeah... >.> both things happened..
